TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content:
Includes:

Failcan Rocket System: It is a series of parts which fit together to make a rocket which is mainly designed to launch your orbital vehicles into space with low levels of lag and fairly reliable. Crafts for both the crewed and Cargo versions are available.

Durgun Orbital Vehicle: It is a series of parts which allows one to construct the Durgun Capsule which is designed to be an Orbital Vehicle by using fuel from the Trunk section (Varying Role Trunks Coming soon) to traverse space with it\'s won engines and RCS modules. Once it is time to return home the Capsule is separated from the Trunk and begins it\'s decent. It has the option to land with parachutes in water OR use its engines and onboard fuel to power decent to land on the terrain.

DOWNLOAD:

Please give Balancing feed back and post pictures

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1417259/kerbal/cBBp_Sky_Penetration_Co._Produces_Pack._V0.4.zip

Directions:

Behold a Video

A few things to note about landing. When reentering keep your SAS off till you are aligned correctly with the surface. it should automatically right itself in the right manner. In a good landing you should have enough fuel for an Abort. To abort just put the engines to Full and empty the tank. Then activate the parachutes. Fire RCS before hitting the ground and the crew should live. Other wise only use chutes over water.

In the Failcan the 2nd stage is supposed to have a long burn time. This is how the real one works.

Future Plans:

1 meter Adapter for Durgun

Upper Dockur to complete the docking idea. Will have models ready when docking arrives.

Kerlin 2 Engines.

Tri Adapter for 1 meter engines to fit 1.5 like SpaceX griffon Engine plans.

Either persist parts or Something Big... not sure which path I should take. the 3m version seemed unpopular. I saw no pics or stories of it so i am assuming it is unneeded.

Changes:

Scaled it all down to 1.5 meter.

Removed the 3meter version. It was too big. I kept the engines since they seem popular.

Renamed the 1 meter engines to Kriffun to follow SpaceX Griffon.

Disclaimer: this mod is mostly based off of ideas that are coming from the real life private space company, SpaceX. However my Parts are not to exact scale nor exact detail or use. They merely heavily influence them . The Failcan might seem a little over powered when you fly it stock however it is made to lift things. if there is nothing to lift of course it gets to space easily. However that is not to say that it is not hard to get into orbit with it.
Gonna play with these for a bit, looks great.
